description: Mira calligraphiae monumenta; Joris Hoefnagel (Flemish / Hungarian, 1542 - 1600), and Georg Bocskay (Hungarian, died 1575); Vienna, Austria; 1561 to 1596; Tempera colors, watercolors, gold and silver paint, and ink on parchment and paper bound between pasteboard covered with red morocco; Leaf: 16.6 × 12.4 cm (6 9/16 × 4 7/8 in.); Ms. 20; J.
